result.title: Ready to use models and decision support tool for management of waste geomaterials
result.description: On completion of WP3 we will have 4 ready to use models to describe various features of ageing of improved waste geomaterials validated with the experiments carried out in WPs 1 and 2 and a decision support tool for the management of excavated waste geomaterials as a function of the site and climatic conditions month 66
